messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] broken leg stuff
messages.messageBody:
>From: Alan & Brenda Leonard <abtleo@...>

<<b-a-b-y w-i-p-e-s!

It's what the army guys use in the field. I have a 6 year old and a 38
yearold. Guess who uses more baby wipes? <g>>


I always have baby wipes around long after I really "need" them!! They are
great for wiping off sneakers and stains in carpets and on clothes. I highly
recommend them!!!

Mary B

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] broken leg stuff
messages.msgSnippet: ... b-a-b-y  w-i-p-e-s! It s what the army guys use in the field.  I have a 6 year old and a 38 year old.  Guess who uses more baby wipes?   brenda
messages.messageBody:
10/27/02 05:29:

> I've also heard of cleansing cloths used for people who can't bathe
> or shower, but can't remember the name.

b-a-b-y w-i-p-e-s!

It's what the army guys use in the field. I have a 6 year old and a 38 year
old. Guess who uses more baby wipes? <g>

brenda
